# Test fix dependency tools
# if tools.go already exists, nothing happens
exec $IGNITE doctor
stdout 'tools/tools.go exists'
# assert tools.go has not changed
cmp tools/tools.go tools.go.golden

-- config.yml --
version: 1
-- go.mod --
module github.com/ignite/cli

go 1.19
-- tools/tools.go --
//go:build tools

package tools

import (
	_ "github.com/bufbuild/buf/cmd/buf"
	_ "github.com/grpc-ecosystem/grpc-gateway/protoc-gen-grpc-gateway"
	_ "github.com/grpc-ecosystem/grpc-gateway/protoc-gen-swagger"
	_ "github.com/grpc-ecosystem/grpc-gateway/v2/protoc-gen-openapiv2"
	_ "github.com/regen-network/cosmos-proto/protoc-gen-gocosmos"
)
-- tools.go.golden --
//go:build tools

package tools

import (
	_ "github.com/bufbuild/buf/cmd/buf"
	_ "github.com/grpc-ecosystem/grpc-gateway/protoc-gen-grpc-gateway"
	_ "github.com/grpc-ecosystem/grpc-gateway/protoc-gen-swagger"
	_ "github.com/grpc-ecosystem/grpc-gateway/v2/protoc-gen-openapiv2"
	_ "github.com/regen-network/cosmos-proto/protoc-gen-gocosmos"
)
